nodes.text: Padmé Amidala's amulet was a transparisteel and stone amulet Padmé Amidala was given by her parents when she became Princess of Theed. Ruwee Naberrie found the precious stone on their very own land and Jobal Naberrie crafted the clasp herself.

In the young Queen's opinion, this single object represented all the love and protection her parents endowed to her. She lent the amulet to Sabé for protection when the handmaiden became her decoy during the Trade Federation invasion.
